name: Edward Newgate
text: On Play Add the top card of your deck to the top of your life cards. Then, look at all your life cards, place 1 of the cards on the top of your deck. Return your remaining life cards in your desired order.

effect.text: Add the top card of your deck to the top of your life cards. Then, look at all your life cards, place 1 of the cards on the top of your deck. Return your remaining life cards in your desired order.
